segments.text: I see a woman so focused on polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water spilling over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so unaware of the mess growing at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how she’s oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water cascades down the cabinets, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there’s that boy on the stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so precarious, like he could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is that girl just standing there, waiting for a cookie?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she see how dangerous it is to help him?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen, with its calm garden view, feels so deceptive right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
